thread.section_title: Vision Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vision Direct Australia | www.visiondirect.com.au
thread.title: Rebecca
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Rebecca

author: Rebecca
title: Rebecca
text:
Easy to shop, easy to pay (I used PayPal).
Tracking of my purchase was provided and it was accurate.
Delivery was quick (within 7 days of order including weekend).
The product was exactly what I ordered. Genuine RayBan sunglasses.
Very happy and would recommend!
Paid more than twice this amount for the same glasses last year in a retail store. Will never do that again.
